text: Vitaliy Holubyev (10 April 1930 – 6 October 1996) was an association footballer from the former Soviet Union who played for FC Dynamo Kyiv. In 1956 Holubyev played couple of games for Ukraine at the Spartakiad of the Peoples of the USSR.Football at the 1956 Spartakiad of the Peoples of USSR ==References== Category:1926 births Category:1991 deaths Category:Footballers from Moscow Category:Soviet footballers Category:Ukrainian footballers Category:Soviet Top League players Category:FC Dynamo Luhansk players Category:FC CSKA Kyiv players Category:FC Dynamo Kyiv players Category:FC Podillya Khmelnytskyi players Category:FC Nyva Vinnytsia players Category:FC Frunzenets-Liha-99 Sumy players Category:Merited Coaches of Ukraine Category:Association football defenders
title: Vitaliy Holubyev
